knimeNode.name: Date&Time Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a date&time in a string flow variable with a given value.

intro.p: Outputs a string flow variable with a given date&time value. The value can also be controlled from a quick form (web port).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).
If a button with the label Now to insert the current time shall be shown in the wizard.
In which granularity the time should be displayed in the wizard.
Which date&time type should be selectable.
The earliest allowed date&time. The execution time can be used.
The latest allowed date&time. The execution time can be used.
The value that is selected by default. The execution time can be used.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
